As per Annex II Acronyms and Glossary of Terms, a substance of concern (SoC) is a ‘substance that
meets at least one of three criteria:’
(1) ‘meets the criteria laid down in Article 57 and is identified in accordance with Article 59
(1) of Regulation (EC) No 1907/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council
(REACH) – this group of substances corresponds to Substances of Very High Concern;
